question: [Detailed] English: Identify the slope of the noisy line for the plotted line.

qas.question: [Detailed] English: Identify the slope of the noisy line for the plotted line.
[Explain] Polski: Okresl the intercept of the noisy line dla narysowanej prostej.
[Practice] Svenska: Ange the value of y when x equals 1 for linjen i diagrammet.
